articles.title: Man charged with murder after woman, 38, found dead in Lynn, DA says
articles.description:
Police arrived at an address on Newhall Street in response to a call just before 1 a.m. Sunday, the office of Essex County District Attorney Paul Tucker said in a press release.

The post Man charged with murder after woman, 38, found dead in Lynn, DA says appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police found a 38-year-old woman dead on Newhall Street in Lynn early Sunday.
A man has been charged with her murder, according to Essex County DA Paul Tucker.
The incident raises concerns about safety in Lynn for local residents.

articles.title: Jakobi Meyers shuts down questions about trade request: ‘Happy to be a Raider’
articles.description:
The former Patriots receiver says he's happy in Las Vegas even though he recently requested a trade.

The post Jakobi Meyers shuts down questions about trade request: ‘Happy to be a Raider’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jakobi Meyers, former Patriots receiver, expresses happiness playing for the Raiders.
Meyers requested a trade recently but remains committed to his new team.
Boston fans may feel the impact of losing a local talent in Meyers.

articles.title: Cora gets 600th win with Red Sox, Sogard hits 2-run double in 9th of 7-4 win over Diamondbacks
articles.description:
Cora trails only Joe Cronin (1,071) and Terry Francona (744) for wins by a Boston manager.

The post Cora gets 600th win with Red Sox, Sogard hits 2-run double in 9th of 7-4 win over Diamondbacks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Cora achieved his 600th win as Red Sox manager on September 7.
Sogard's 2-run double in the 9th secured a 7-4 victory over the Diamondbacks.
Cora ranks third in Red Sox history for managerial wins, enhancing local pride.

articles.title: Tornado confirmed in Mass. town as powerful storm sweeps over region
articles.description:
The tornado watch was extended as far east as Stow but didn’t reach closer to the Boston area, the National Weather Service said.

The post Tornado confirmed in Mass. town as powerful storm sweeps over region appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Tornado confirmed in Stow, Massachusetts, as powerful storm impacts the region.
Tornado watch extended to Stow, but did not reach Boston area.
Residents advised to stay alert as severe weather continues across Massachusetts.

articles.title: Pope Leo XIV declares teen computer whiz Carlo Acutis the first millennial saint
articles.description:
Leo canonized Acutis, who died in 2006, during an open-air Mass in St. Peter’s Square before an estimated 80,000 people, many of them millennials and couples with young children.

The post Pope Leo XIV declares teen computer whiz Carlo Acutis the first millennial saint appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pope Leo XIV canonized Carlo Acutis as the first millennial saint on September 7, 2025.
The ceremony attracted around 80,000 attendees, including many millennials and families.
Boston's youth may find inspiration in Acutis' story, promoting faith and technology integration.

articles.title: In a season promising change, the 2025 Patriots looked all too familiar in season opener
articles.description:
"Didn't take advantage of bad football and then were able to have bad football ourselves.”

The post In a season promising change, the 2025 Patriots looked all too familiar in season opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots lost their season opener on September 7, 2025, showcasing familiar struggles.
Coach emphasized failure to capitalize on opponents' mistakes, reflecting ongoing issues.
Local fans express disappointment, fearing another underwhelming season for the team.

articles.title: Will Campbell’s NFL debut was solid until things began to unravel late in the second half
articles.description:
The first half was uneventful for Las Vegas's pass rushers. In the second half, they benefitted from rookie mistakes.

The post Will Campbell’s NFL debut was solid until things began to unravel late in the second half appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Will Campbell made his NFL debut for the Las Vegas Raiders on September 7, 2025.
Campbell's performance declined in the second half due to rookie mistakes against the pass rush.
Boston fans are watching Campbell's progress as a potential future star for the Patriots.
